wikipedia_page.main: Barton Bouchier (1794–1864) was an English religious writer.

response: George Thornbury was born on 13 November 1828, the son of a London solicitor, reared by his aunt and educated by her husband, Reverend Barton Bouchier.A book of recollections, Volume 1, John Cordy Jeaffreson, p. 89, (London 1894).
